thread.title: Fraser Yachts announces the Sale of M/Y ALASKA and M/Y SEACALL and adds Eight New Yachts to their Central Agency Sales Listings
thread.title_full: Fraser Yachts announces the Sale of M/Y ALASKA and M/Y SEACALL and adds Eight New Yachts to their Central Agency Sales Listings

title: Fraser Yachts announces the Sale of M/Y ALASKA and M/Y SEACALL and adds Eight New Yachts to their Central Agency Sales Listings
text:
Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Fraser Yachts announces the Sale of M/Y ALASKA and M/Y SEACALL and adds Eight New Yachts to their Central Agency Sales Listings Fraser Yachts, the world's leading yacht brokerage, announces the sale of two yachts and the addition of eight yachts to their fleet of superyachts for sale. YouTube Video 
M/Y TO-TOK MONACO, September 18,   Fraser Yachts is very pleased to announce the sale of two yachts in August, as well as the addition of eight yachts to their fleet of superyachts for sale . These include: M/Y HELIOS 2, M/Y ZOOM ZOOM ZOOM, M/Y 47M FEADSHIP, M/Y BAGLIETTO 43 FAST, M/Y TO-TOK, M/Y SOL, M/Y CODENE and S/Y MYSTERY. M/Y HELIOS 2 is a beautiful and highly pedigreed 51.13m displacement yacht from Palmer Johnson, boasting both modern and classic styles. She has an incredibly spacious layout and also offers great outside spaces for both relaxing and entertaining. With the ability to accommodate up to 12 guests in five stunning staterooms, she is the perfect yacht to spend with family and friends. She is on the market for USD 17,500,000. The renowned and fast displacement yacht M/Y ZOOM ZOOM ZOOM , is now available for a sale. With a range of 3000nm at 10 knots and a top speed of 23 knots and her Quantum zero speed stabilizers, she is a busy and very popular charter yacht with an established charter record. She was refit in 2013 and is currently undergoing a 10 year ABS survey. With a massive price reduction, M/Y ZOOM ZOOM ZOOM is now available on the market for USD 12,900,000. She is not available for sale to U.S. residents while in U.S. waters. The beautiful M/Y 47M FEADSHIP was built by Feadship for an experienced yachtsman. With an interior design by the renowned Terence Disdale, she is a superyacht with unparalleled pedigree. Her layout is beyond exceptional, as is her charter potential, range and seakeeping. Maintained in immaculate condition, she is on the market for USD 9,900,000 VAT paid. She is not available for sale to U.S. residents while in U.S. waters. M/Y BAGLIETTO 43 FAST is an iconic yacht designed by the worldwide renowned designer Francesco Paszkowski. With the shipyard having extensive knowledge of fast and sleek aluminium yachts, M/Y BAGLIETTO is sure to be a true masterpiece. She will be able to accommodate 10 guests in five luxurious staterooms. She is available for sale for EUR 21,000,000. M/Y TO-TOK is a 37.92m Sanlorenzo yacht that demonstrates the shipyard's quality, attention to detail and elegance. Almost brand new, she accommodates 12 guests in five beautiful and luxurious staterooms. She is completely fine-tuned and under full warranty. She will be on display at the 2015 Monaco Yacht Show from the 23rd to the 26th of September. She is on the market for USD 18,200,000 and is not for sale to U.S. residents while in U.S. waters. Another new addition to Fraser Yacht's sales listings is M/Y SOL from Riva. The 37.49m yacht built in 2014 is the first unit of the Mythos 122' model and is one of the largest and most sophisticated Riva yachts ever built. She features a highly appointed Italian decor and can accommodate six guests in three elegant staterooms, including a full beam owner's suite with a spa bath and sauna. She is both sleek and fast, reaching up to 32 knots in speed.. She is available for sale for USD 13,800,000. Not for sale to U.S. residents while in U.S. waters. M/Y CODENE is an elegant 35.05m explorer yacht built by Tenix Defence. Built in 2005 with a recent refit in 2013, nothing was spared in her construction, with her owner having continually improved and maintained her. She is an outstanding expedition vessel having cruised some of the world's most remote areas. She completed her Lloyd's survey and certification in 2013. She is available for sale at USD 7,850,000. Built in 2000, S/Y MYSTERY is a splendid 112s Nautor's Swan sailing yacht. Having had a massive refit in 2015, she now features all new electronics and many other additional improvements. She can comfortably accommodate eight guests in four classically designed staterooms. She is in superb condition and available on the market for USD 4,950,000. If you would like high-res photography or further information about any of the Fraser Yachts sales listings, please contact Randi Myers at Fraser Yachts Randi.Myers@fraseryachts.com .Fraser Yachts is the world's leading, full-service yachting company, and provides a professional team of yachting experts ready to support, advise and to assist you in every aspect of superyacht charter, luxury yacht sales , yacht ownership, and day-to-day operation. Visit their website at www.fraseryachts.com for further information. # # #
